plot outline: Vignaharta Mahaganpati is a film which deals with the historical and modern day interpretations of religion, spirituality and superstitions. The movie is based on the Khavale Mahaganpati which is located at Taramumbari village in the Devgarh district of Maharashtra.
title: Vighnaharta Mahaganpati
plot: Vignaharta Mahaganpati is a film which deals with the historical and modern day interpretations of religion, spirituality and superstitions. The movie is based on the Khavale Mahaganpati which is located at Taramumbari village in the Devgarh district of Maharashtra.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
